OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD WOMENS COUNSELLING AND THERAPY SERVICE

Desc.entry: A registered charity which offers a free counselling and psychotherapy service for women aged over 16 years who have experienced some kind of crisis or trauma. This includes neglect, harassment or abuse (domestic/sexual/emotional). Also offers a consultation service for professionals. Self or any referral.

ContactName.entry: Beth Longstaff, Business Development Manager/Elaine Douglas, Office Administrator

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 9am-3pm, Fri 9am-3pm, later appointments may be available on Thursdays, please contact for details

category.entry: COUNSELLING AND THERAPY - CHARITABLE AND VOLUNTARY SERVICES
